kpi.name: M1034C3

kpi_info.title: INTER SYSTEM HHO NRT SUCCESS PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The number of successful inter-system handovers for NRT. The call is considered as NRT from handover point of view when only NRT RABs exist. UPDATED: When the source RNC receives an RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND message with a normal release cause from the CN - when inter-system handover procedure is ongoing.

kpi.kpi_alias: INTER SYSTEM HHO NRT SUCCESS PER OPER
